concept.title: 6.206 Set-asides for service-disabled veteran-owned small business concerns.

li.p:
(a)
To fulfill the statutory requirements relating to the Veterans Benefits Act of2003 (15 U.S.C.657f), contracting officers may set-aside solicitations to allow only service-disabled veteran-owned small business concerns to compete (see 19.1405).

(b)
No separate justification or determination and findings are required under this part to set aside a contract action for service-disabled veteran-owned small business concerns.
